p: Solidified extract (0.5 gm) was taken in separate test tubes and mixed with 20 ml of distilled water. The mixtures were boiled in a water bath for 10 min. After cooling, the mixture was separately filtered through a Whatman No. 1 filter paper. Thereafter, 2 ml of 1% aqueous hydrochloric acid was added to each mixture and shaken to develop red precipitate that indicates the presence of phlorotannins [ 31].
